metadata.synopsis: This is dialogue played by the ward device placed on the wall in Devil's Fee. This AD will be played when player clicks on the ward and opens combo UI.It resembles the head of the imp or the devil.When the player resolves the puzzle by combining this head device with any liquid bottle ward disables the trap.
metadata.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_AGoto -47 11Click on the head of the devil.

0.speaker: GROUP_DiabolistTrap_Imp
0.text: Gravelled tongue, sanded throat. Hard to swallow... hurts to breathe...
0.context: NodeContext: INCREDIBLY thirsty, tongue is just sticking to the rough of his mouth, gasping for a drink of ANYTHING
